radiographic_examinations.findings: No RIUT (0%) by the thyroid; Absence of 123I uptake by the thyroid, salivary and gastric tissues.
Marked enlargement of the thyroid (calculated thyroid volume, 3.8 ml; normal, 1 ml), positioned in the normal pretracheal position.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Thyroid size returned to normal during thyroid hormone replacement therapy.
